```lisp
[
  '(:action gather ; Gather resources and update possession status
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (possessed ?agent ?item)) (at ?item ?location))
    :effect (and (possessed ?agent ?item) (organized ?item))
  )',
  '(:action start
    :parameters (?p - person ?item1 - object ?item2 - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item1) (at ?p ?item2) (or (sealed ?item2) (in ?item1 ?item2) (full ?item2)))
    :effect (and (or (shaking ?p ?item2) (stopped_adding ?item1 ?item2)))
  )',
  '(:action add
    ; Add or modify an entity within a container or mixture
    :parameters (?p - person ?container - container ?item - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?location)
        (is_container ?container)
        (is_entity ?item)
        (not (processed ?item ?container))
    )
    :effect (and
        (processed ?item ?container)
        (not (unprocessed ?item ?container))
    )
  )',
  '(:action mix
    ; Mix entities within a container
    :parameters (?p - person ?container - container ?item1 - object ?item2 - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?location)
        (is_container ?container)
        (is_entity ?item1)
        (is_entity ?item2)
        (in_container ?item1 ?container)
        (in_container ?item2 ?container)
        (not (mixed ?item1 ?item2))
    )
    :effect (and
        (mixed ?item1 ?item2)
        (not (separate ?item1 ?item2))
    )
  )',
  '(:action blend
    ; Blend entities in a blender or similar device
    :parameters (?p - person ?device - device ?item - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?device)
        (is_device ?device)
        (is_entity ?item)
        (in_device ?item ?device)
        (not (blended ?item))
        (off ?device)
    )
    :effect (and
        (blended ?item)
        (not (separate ?item))
    )
  )',
  '(:action open ; Open a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (sealed ?item) (full ?item))
    :effect (and (open ?item) (not (sealed ?item)))
  )',
  '(:action transform_state ; Transform the state of an entity based on specific conditions
    :parameters (?entity - object ?tool - object ?state_from - state ?state_to - state)
    :precondition (and (has_state ?entity ?state_from) (can_use ?tool) (available ?tool))
    :effect (and (has_state ?entity ?state_to) (not (has_state ?entity ?state_from)))
  )',
  '(:action wet_wicks
    :parameters (?p - person ?w - wick ?water - tool)
    :precondition (and (has_state ?w dry) (available ?water) (can_use ?water))
    :effect (and (has_state ?w wet) (not (has_state ?w dry)))
  )',
  '(:action microwave_butter
    :parameters (?a - person ?b - object ?m - device)
    :precondition (and (has_state ?b cubed) (in_microwave ?b) (available ?m) (can_use ?m))
    :effect (and (has_state ?b softened) (not (has_state ?b cubed)))
  )',
  '(:action warm_cream
    :parameters (?c - object ?s - device)
    :precondition (and (has_state ?c cool) (available ?s) (can_use ?s))
    :effect (and (has_state ?c warm) (not (has_state ?c cool)))
  )',
  '(:action cool_mixture
    :parameters (?m - object ?f - device)
    :precondition (and (has_state ?m room_temp) (available ?f) (can_use ?f))
    :effect (and (has_state ?m cool) (in_fridge ?m) (not (has_state ?m room_temp)))
  )',
  '(:action drain
    :parameters (?p - person ?entity - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (available ?p) (not (drained ?entity)) (or (in_container ?entity ?container) (full ?container)))
    :effect (and 
            (drained ?entity) 
            (not (in_container ?entity ?container))
    )
  )',
  '(:action knead
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?container - container ?npc - person ?b - device ?processor - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (or (and (in_container ?item ?container) (not (kneaded ?item)))
            (and (at ?p ?b) (on ?b))
            (and (in_drawer ?processor))
            (on ?npc))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or (and (kneaded ?item) (not (in_container ?item ?container))))
    )
  )',
  '(:action cut ;  Cut an object and update its state
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?tool - tool ?location - place ?container - container)
    :precondition (and 
                    (at ?p ?location)
                    (in_hand ?tool)
                    (or (is_butter ?item) (is_cream ?item) (is_ingredient ?item))
                    (or (frozen ?item) (whole ?item) (not (sliced ?item)))
                    (or (at ?p ?item) (in_container ?item ?container))
                    (or (on_counter ?location) (full ?container))
                  )
    :effect (and 
              (or (cut ?item into_pieces) (sliced ?item) (chopped ?item))
    )
  )',
  '(:action push ; Push an item into a container or device and update the status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (at ?p ?container) (in ?item ?origin))
    :effect (and (pushed ?item ?container) (not (in ?item ?origin)))
  )',
  '(:action know ; Know a fact and update understanding
    :parameters (?person - person ?object - object ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (focused_on ?person ?context) (location ?object in_context ?context))
    :effect (and (aware ?person when_applicable ?object) (location ?object in_new_context ?context))
  )',
  '(:action measure ; Measure a resource and update container status
    :parameters (?p - person ?resource - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?container) (empty ?container))
    :effect (and (measured ?resource) (not (empty ?container)))
  )',
  '(:action calculate
    :parameters (?entity - person ?resource - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity ?resource) (at ?entity ?location) (prepared ?resource))
    :effect (calculated ?resource ?location)
  )',
  '(:action modify_state
    :parameters (?entity - object ?tool - object ?state_before - state ?state_after - state)
    :precondition (and (has_state ?entity ?state_before) (in_hand ?tool))
    :effect (and (has_state ?entity ?state_after) (not (has_state ?entity ?state_before)))
  )',
  '(:action pulse ; Pulse an item to transform its state
    :parameters (?p - person ?device - device ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (is_device ?device) (contains ?device ?item))
    :effect (and (pulsed ?item) (transformed ?item))
  )'
]
```
